posts.title: About SONAR
posts.lexical:

posts.html:
SONAR is a community and creative center devoted to sensory artists musicians, designers, visual artists, storytellers, and anyone whose craft evokes a visceral, sensory response. If your work aims to move people through sound, sight, movement, or emotion, SONAR is your home.

At its heart, SONAR is both a community and a center. SONAR is a place designed to host intimate gatherings that support deep connection, self-discovery, and artistic collaboration. It’s a space where individuals can encounter themselves, each other, and their creativity in an environment that balances safety with meaningful challenge.

Join US

Why Join SONAR?

Becoming a member of SONAR means joining a vibrant, expression-based ecosystem where your work and presence matter.

Members receive:

  • Access to our media archive and equipment

  • Priority booking for rehearsal, performance, and recording space

  • The ability to co-create events with the SONAR team

  • Early access to workshops, content, and releases from other artists in the community

Curious if you qualify? You do. If you notice the motivation to connect - you're already a part of what SONAR is becoming!

Learn more

Become a Member

Step into a space that celebrates who you are, how you express yourself, and the creative encounters you’re ready to share.

Join the SONAR community and help shape a center where sound art, visual art, and narrative art come alive.
posts.plaintext:
SONAR is a community and creative center devoted to sensory artists musicians, designers, visual artists, storytellers, and anyone whose craft evokes a visceral, sensory response. If your work aims to move people through sound, sight, movement, or emotion, SONAR is your home.


At its heart, SONAR is both a community and a center. SONAR is a place designed to host intimate gatherings that support deep connection, self-discovery, and artistic collaboration. It’s a space where individuals can encounter themselves, each other, and their creativity in an environment that balances safety with meaningful challenge.


Join US


Why Join SONAR?


Becoming a member of SONAR means joining a vibrant, expression-based ecosystem where your work and presence matter.


Members receive:


 * 
   
   
   Access to our media archive and equipment
   

 * 
   
   
   Priority booking for rehearsal, performance, and recording space
   

 * 
   
   
   The ability to co-create events with the SONAR team
   

 * 
   
   
   Early access to workshops, content, and releases from other artists in the community
   










Curious if you qualify? You do. If you notice the motivation to connect - you're already a part of what SONAR is becoming!






Learn more








Become a Member


Step into a space that celebrates who you are, how you express yourself, and the creative encounters you’re ready to share.


Join the SONAR community and help shape a center where sound art, visual art, and narrative art come alive.

posts.html:
Explore Experiences

At SONAR, every experience is an invitation to discover what moves you — and sometimes, what moves you might surprise you.

Imagine the story of a young boy who came here just wanting to learn how to play the guitar. But along the way, he started recording the quiet snores of his dog and the soft purr of his cat — turning everyday sounds into his very first song. He left knowing music doesn’t just come from instruments, but from paying attention to the world around him.

People have found community and belonging here. A young woman walked in for a single concert, hoping for something different. She found herself surrounded by people who really listened — who asked about her life, encouraged her dreams, and showed up when she needed it most. Now, she calls this community her circle of friends, a place where she finally feels seen and heard.

It takes making the time to notice what you have, just as an older father did when he brought his middle school son one weekend, thinking they’d simply share some music together. Instead, he found himself picking up a sketchbook, laughing at his clumsy drawings, strumming a few notes, and telling his son stories about the mistakes and lessons that shaped him. In that simple afternoon, he showed his son that life doesn’t have to be perfect to be full — and that there’s always room to grow and play, no matter your age.

Everyone’s path here is different. Some come for the music. Some stay for the connection. All discover something real. Come see what you might find.
posts.plaintext:
Explore Experiences

At SONAR, every experience is an invitation to discover what moves you — and sometimes, what moves you might surprise you.

Imagine the story of a young boy who came here just wanting to learn how to play the guitar. But along the way, he started recording the quiet snores of his dog and the soft purr of his cat — turning everyday sounds into his very first song. He left knowing music doesn’t just come from instruments, but from paying attention to the world around him.

People have found community and belonging here. A young woman walked in for a single concert, hoping for something different. She found herself surrounded by people who really listened — who asked about her life, encouraged her dreams, and showed up when she needed it most. Now, she calls this community her circle of friends, a place where she finally feels seen and heard.

It takes making the time to notice what you have, just as an older father did when he brought his middle school son one weekend, thinking they’d simply share some music together. Instead, he found himself picking up a sketchbook, laughing at his clumsy drawings, strumming a few notes, and telling his son stories about the mistakes and lessons that shaped him. In that simple afternoon, he showed his son that life doesn’t have to be perfect to be full — and that there’s always room to grow and play, no matter your age.

Everyone’s path here is different. Some come for the music. Some stay for the connection. All discover something real. Come see what you might find.

posts.html:
SONAR AZ is an independent publication launched in May 2025 by Adam Petty. If you subscribe today, you'll get full access to the website as well as email newsletters about new content when it's available. Your subscription makes this site possible, and allows SONAR AZ to continue to exist. Thank you!

Access all areas

By signing up, you'll get access to the full archive of everything that's been published before and everything that's still to come. Your very own private library.

Fresh content, delivered

Stay up to date with new content sent straight to your inbox! No more worrying about whether you missed something because of a pesky algorithm or news feed.

Meet people like you

Join a community of other subscribers who share the same interests.

Start your own thing

Enjoying the experience? Get started for free and set up your very own subscription business using Ghost, the same platform that powers this website.

posts.title: Offerings
posts.lexical:
{"root":{"children":[{"type":"callout","version":1,"calloutText":"

"SONAR is for finding your home. Those providing unique and ecclectic programs find resources, support and encouragement, and those wanting to find themselves find connection and commitment."

","calloutEmoji":"","backgroundColor":"blue"},{"type":"markdown","version":1,"markdown":"## Creativity-Inspired Psychoeducation Discover how creativity supports mental health and well-being. These guided workshops blend expressive arts, storytelling, and play to help you understand yourself and connect with others. Through hands-on activities, you'll build emotional skills, expand your sense of safety, and find new ways to express what words alone can't. Each session offers a safe space to reflect and grow without judgment. Whether you're new to group work or a seasoned seeker, you'll gain insights and creative practices that inspire lasting healing and connection. [ **Explore Upcoming Education Opportunities** ](__GHOST_URL__/events?tags=sonar,psychoeducation) ## Art & Sound Workshops Explore visual art, sound art, and narrative art in workshops designed to cultivate calmness, centeredness, and authentic action. Guided by local and visiting artists, these sessions invite you to slow down, meditate, and refine your unique voice through painting, sculpting, storytelling, or experimental sound. Each gathering is a chance to reconnect with your inner world, discover new ways to express yourself, and bring creative visions to life in an inspiring, supportive atmosphere. [ **Join Art / Sound Workshops** ](__GHOST_URL__/events?tags=sonar,art,sound) ## Modern Music Masterclasses & Performances SONAR supports modern composers and musicians whose voices are often overlooked in traditional venues. Our masterclasses and performances create space for contemporary sounds and bold new ideas. Residencies give music groups dedicated time to develop, rehearse, and share original work. Local and visiting artists offer intimate concerts and hands-on learning that inspire both audiences and emerging talent. Whether you're a performer, composer, or curious listener, join us in amplifying the next generation of sound. [ **View Masterclasses & Concerts** ](__GHOST_URL__/events?tags=sonar,masterclass,music)"},{"children":[],"direction":null,"format":"","indent":0,"type":"paragraph","version":1}],"direction":null,"format":"","indent":0,"type":"root","version":1}}
posts.html:
"SONAR is for finding your home. Those providing unique and ecclectic programs find resources, support and encouragement, and those wanting to find themselves find connection and commitment."

Creativity-Inspired Psychoeducation

Discover how creativity supports mental health and well-being. These guided workshops blend expressive arts, storytelling, and play to help you understand yourself and connect with others. Through hands-on activities, you'll build emotional skills, expand your sense of safety, and find new ways to express what words alone can't. Each session offers a safe space to reflect and grow without judgment. Whether you're new to group work or a seasoned seeker, you'll gain insights and creative practices that inspire lasting healing and connection.

Explore Upcoming Education Opportunities

Art & Sound Workshops

Explore visual art, sound art, and narrative art in workshops designed to cultivate calmness, centeredness, and authentic action. Guided by local and visiting artists, these sessions invite you to slow down, meditate, and refine your unique voice through painting, sculpting, storytelling, or experimental sound. Each gathering is a chance to reconnect with your inner world, discover new ways to express yourself, and bring creative visions to life in an inspiring, supportive atmosphere.

Join Art / Sound Workshops

Modern Music Masterclasses & Performances

SONAR supports modern composers and musicians whose voices are often overlooked in traditional venues. Our masterclasses and performances create space for contemporary sounds and bold new ideas. Residencies give music groups dedicated time to develop, rehearse, and share original work. Local and visiting artists offer intimate concerts and hands-on learning that inspire both audiences and emerging talent. Whether you're a performer, composer, or curious listener, join us in amplifying the next generation of sound.

View Masterclasses & Concerts
posts.plaintext:
"SONAR is for finding your home. Those providing unique and ecclectic programs find resources, support and encouragement, and those wanting to find themselves find connection and commitment."


Creativity-Inspired Psychoeducation


Discover how creativity supports mental health and well-being. These guided workshops blend expressive arts, storytelling, and play to help you understand yourself and connect with others. Through hands-on activities, you'll build emotional skills, expand your sense of safety, and find new ways to express what words alone can't. Each session offers a safe space to reflect and grow without judgment. Whether you're new to group work or a seasoned seeker, you'll gain insights and creative practices that inspire lasting healing and connection.


Explore Upcoming Education Opportunities



Art & Sound Workshops


Explore visual art, sound art, and narrative art in workshops designed to cultivate calmness, centeredness, and authentic action. Guided by local and visiting artists, these sessions invite you to slow down, meditate, and refine your unique voice through painting, sculpting, storytelling, or experimental sound. Each gathering is a chance to reconnect with your inner world, discover new ways to express yourself, and bring creative visions to life in an inspiring, supportive atmosphere.


Join Art / Sound Workshops



Modern Music Masterclasses & Performances


SONAR supports modern composers and musicians whose voices are often overlooked in traditional venues. Our masterclasses and performances create space for contemporary sounds and bold new ideas. Residencies give music groups dedicated time to develop, rehearse, and share original work. Local and visiting artists offer intimate concerts and hands-on learning that inspire both audiences and emerging talent. Whether you're a performer, composer, or curious listener, join us in amplifying the next generation of sound.


View Masterclasses & Concerts

posts.title: Bookings
posts.html:
Book a Session or Workshop

At SONAR, we make it easy to reserve your spot for our workshops, masterclasses, concerts, or private studio sessions. Whether you’re looking to join an upcoming group, host a custom workshop, or book time for your creative project, we’re here to help you make it happen. Tell us what you’re interested in below and we’ll be in touch to confirm the details!

Workshops & Group Events

Have interest in hosting a workshop, art, or sound healing?
Submit Workshop Inquiry

Masterclasses & Performances

Reserve space to conduct a masterclass or performace for your group or ensemble.
Book Masterclasses & Concerts

Private Sessions & Studio Time

Book private recording sessions, artist residencies, or one-on-one consultations.
Request Studio Booking

Book a Session or Workshop

Use the form below to request a workshop, masterclass, concert seat, private session, or studio time. We’ll follow up within 2 business days to confirm details.
